sqls.sql: SELECT "納品NO" AS no, "納品名称" AS name, case when "ステータス" = '1.新 規' then "新規数量" when "ステータス" = '2.発送済' then "発送数量" when "ステータス" = '3.受領中' then "受領数量" when "ステータス" = '4.納品済' then "最終納品数量" end as number, "ステータス" AS state, to_char("登録日",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS logindate, to_char("発送日",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS senddate, to_char("受領日",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS receivedate, to_char("完了日",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS completiondate, "AMZ-納品番号" AS amz1, "AMZ-納品名" AS amz2, "AMZ-納品プラン番号" AS amz3, "AMZ-納品先" AS amz4, "AMZ-SKU合計" AS amz5, "AMZ-商品合計数" AS amz6 FROM "TRN_納品管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "納品NO" desc
delete from "TRN_納品管理" where "納品NO" = !no and "店舗ID"= !shopid
insert into "TRN_納品管理" ( "納品NO", "納品名称", "ステータス", "登録日", "店舗ID", "登録日時" )values( !no, !names, '1.新 規', now(), !shopid, now() )
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "納品名称"= !names, "更新日時"= now() WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "納品NO" = !no
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "更新日時" = now(), "新規数量" = ( SELECT sum(TRN2."数量") AS count from "TRN_納品明細" TRN2 WHERE TRN2."店舗ID" = :shopid and TRN2."納品NO" = :no ) WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "納品NO" = :no
SELECT "納品名称" as name FROM "TRN_納品管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "納品NO" = !no
insert into "TRN_納品明細" ( "納品NO", "SKU番号", "ASIN番号", "数量", "受領数量", "店舗ID", "登録日時" )values( !no, !sku, !asin, !num, 0, !shopid, now() )
DELETE FROM "TRN_納品明細" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "納品NO" = !no

SELECT A."商品管理番号" AS productno, A."分類１" AS sub1, A."分類２" AS sub2, A."ASIN番号" AS asin, A."SKU番号" AS sku, A."LABEL番号" AS label, B."FBA在庫" AS fba, B."LOCAL在庫" AS local, CASE WHEN D."ステータス" = '4.納品済' THEN C."受領数量" ELSE C."数量" END AS number FROM "TRN_納品管理" D LEFT JOIN "TRN_納品明細" C ON D."納品NO" = C."納品NO" LEFT JOIN "MST_出品マスタ情報" A ON A."ASIN番号" = C."ASIN番号" AND A."SKU番号" = C."SKU番号" LEFT JOIN "MST_在庫情報" B ON C."ASIN番号" = B."ASIN番号" AND C."SKU番号" = B."SKU番号" LEFT JOIN "MST_ソート情報" S1 on A."商品種別" = S1."商品種別" and S1."分類" = '分類１' and A."分類１" = S1."内容" and A."店舗ID" = S1."店舗ID" LEFT JOIN "MST_ソート情報" S2 on A."商品種別" = S2."商品種別" and S2."分類" = '分類２' and A."分類２" = S2."内容" and A."店舗ID" = S2."店舗ID" WHERE D."店舗ID" = !shopid AND D."納品NO" = !no ORDER BY A."商品管理番号", COALESCE(cast(S1."ソート" as varchar), A."分類１"), COALESCE(cast(S2."ソート" as varchar), A."分類２")

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "途中在庫_入庫" = (CASE WHEN "途中在庫_入庫" - TRN."数量" < 0 THEN 0 ELSE "途中在庫_入庫" - TRN."数量" END), "更新日時"= now() FROM "TRN_納品明細" AS TRN WHERE "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."納品NO" = !no and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = (CASE WHEN "LOCAL在庫" - TRN."数量" < 0 THEN 0 ELSE "LOCAL在庫" - TRN."数量" END), "更新日時"= now() FROM "TRN_納品明細" AS TRN WHERE "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."納品NO" = !no and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "途中在庫_入庫" = "途中在庫_入庫" + TRN."数量", "更新日時"= now() FROM "TRN_納品明細" AS TRN WHERE "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."納品NO" = !no and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = ( CASE WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" <= TRN."受領数量" THEN "LOCAL在庫" + TRN."受領数量" - :acceptance else "LOCAL在庫" WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" > TRN."受領数量" THEN "LOCAL在庫" + TRN."受領数量" - :acceptance else "LOCAL在庫" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."受領数量" = 0 THEN "LOCAL在庫" - :acceptance else "LOCAL在庫" END ) , "途中在庫_入庫" = ( CASE WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" > TRN."受領数量" THEN "途中在庫_入庫" + TRN."受領数量" - :acceptance else TRN."受領数量" END ) , TRN."受領数量" = ( CASE WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" <= TRN."受領数量" THEN :acceptance else TRN."受領数量" WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" > TRN."受領数量" THEN :acceptance else TRN."受領数量" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."受領数量" = 0 AND :acceptance > 0 THEN :acceptance else TRN."受領数量" END ) , TRN."更新日時" = ( CASE WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" <= TRN."受領数量" THEN now( ) else TRN."更新日時" WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" > TRN."受領数量" THEN now( ) else TRN."更新日時" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."受領数量" = 0 AND :acceptance > 0 THEN now( ) else TRN."更新日時" END ) , "更新日時" = ( CASE WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" <= TRN."受領数量" THEN now( ) else "更新日時" WHEN :acceptance > TRN."受領数量" AND TRN."数量" > TRN."受領数量" THEN now( ) else "更新日時" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."受領数量" = 0 AND :acceptance > 0 THEN now( ) else "更新日時" END ) FROM "TRN_納品明細" TRN WHERE TRN."ASIN番号" = :asin and TRN."ASIN番号" = :sku and "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."納品NO" = !no and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "完了日" = now(), "更新日時" = now(), "ステータス" = '4.納品済', "最終納品数量" = ( SELECT sum(TRN2."受領数量") AS count from "TRN_納品明細" TRN2 WHERE TRN2."店舗ID" = :shopid and TRN2."納品NO" = :no ) WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "納品NO" = :no
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "AMZ-納品番号" = :info, "更新日時" = now() WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "納品NO" = :col0
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "AMZ-納品名" = :info, "更新日時" = now() WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "納品NO" = :col0
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "AMZ-納品プラン番号" = :info, "更新日時" = now() WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "納品NO" = :col0
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "AMZ-納品先" = :info, "更新日時" = now() WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "納品NO" = :col0
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "AMZ-SKU合計" = cast(:info as int), "更新日時" = now() WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "納品NO" = :col0
UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "AMZ-商品合計数" = cast(:info as int), "更新日時" = now() WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "納品NO" = :col0
UPDATE "TRN_納品明細" SET "受領数量" = :acceptance, "更新日時" = now() WHERE "SKU番号" = :sku AND "ASIN番号" = :asin AND "納品NO" = :col0 AND "店舗ID" = :shopid
INSERT INTO "TRN_納品明細" ( "納品NO", "SKU番号", "ASIN番号", "数量", "受領数量", "店舗ID", "登録日時" ) VALUES ( :col0,--"納品NO" :col1,--"SKU番号" :col2,--"ASIN番号" '0',--"数量" :col3, --"受領数量" :shopid, now() )

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "更新日時" = now( ), "途中在庫_入庫" = ( CASE WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."数量" = TRN."受領数量" THEN "途中在庫_入庫" - TRN."受領数量" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."数量" < TRN."受領数量" THEN "途中在庫_入庫" - TRN."数量" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."数量" > TRN."受領数量" THEN "途中在庫_入庫" - TRN."受領数量" ELSE "途中在庫_入庫" END ) , "LOCAL在庫" = ( CASE WHEN TRN."数量" = 0 AND TRN."受領数量" > 0 THEN "LOCAL在庫" - TRN."受領数量" WHEN TRN."数量" > 0 AND TRN."数量" < TRN."受領数量" THEN "LOCAL在庫" + TRN."数量" -TRN."受領数量" ELSE "LOCAL在庫" END ) FROM "TRN_納品明細" TRN WHERE "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."納品NO" = :no and TRN."店舗ID" = :shopid

UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "受領日" = now(), "更新日時" = now(), "ステータス" = '3.受領中', "受領数量" = ( SELECT sum(TRN2."受領数量") AS count from "TRN_納品明細" TRN2 WHERE TRN2."店舗ID" = :shopid and TRN2."納品NO" = :no ) WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "納品NO" = :no

UPDATE "TRN_納品管理" SET "発送日" = now(), "ステータス" = '2.発送済', "更新日時" = now(), "発送数量" = ( SELECT sum(TRN2."数量") AS count from "TRN_納品明細" TRN2 WHERE TRN2."店舗ID" = :shopid and TRN2."納品NO" = :no ) WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "納品NO" = :no

select m."商品種別" as type, m."商品管理番号" as pno, m."親子区分" as preproduct, m."分類１" as sub1, m."分類２" as sub2, m."ASIN番号" as asin, m."SKU番号" as sku, m."LABEL番号" as label, m."商品名称" as productname, e."価格" as price, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null when d."FBA在庫" != 0 then 'FBA' when d."FBA在庫" is null and d."FBM在庫" is null then '-' when d."FBA在庫" is null and d."FBM在庫" is not null then 'FBM' when d."FBA在庫" = 0 and d."FBM在庫" is null then 'FBA' when d."FBA在庫" = 0 and d."FBM在庫" = 0 then '-' when d."FBA在庫" = 0 and d."FBM在庫" != 0 then 'FBM' end as shippingway, d."FBA在庫" as fba, d."FBM在庫" as fbm, d."途中在庫_入庫" as put, d."LOCAL在庫" as local, d."途中在庫_仕入" as purchase, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."FBA在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."FBM在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_入庫", 0) end as stockonsell, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."LOCAL在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_仕入", 0) end as stockprepare, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."FBA在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."FBM在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_入庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."LOCAL在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_仕入", 0) end as stockall, b."販売数量（直近３日間）" as selled3, b."販売数量（直近７日間）" as selled7, b."販売数量（直近３０日間）" as selled30, b."販売数量（直近６０日間）" as selled60, b."販売数量（直近９０日間）" as selled90, b."販売数量（直近１８０日間）" as selled180, b."販売数量（直近３６０日間）" as selled360, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else rpad(cast(round(b."販売数量（日平均値）", 5) as varchar), 5, '0') end as dayaverage,
m."店舗ID" as shopid, m."暫定フラグ" as zt_flg, a."数量" as deliveryquantity from "MST_出品マスタ情報" m left join "TRN_納品明細" a on m."ASIN番号" = a."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = a."SKU番号" and m."店舗ID" = a."店舗ID" and a."納品NO" = :no left join "MST_販売数量情報" b on m."ASIN番号" = b."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = b."SKU番号" and m."店舗ID" = b."店舗ID" left join "MST_入庫仕入推奨数量情報" c on m."ASIN番号" = c."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = c."SKU番号" and m."店舗ID" = c."店舗ID" left join "MST_在庫情報" d on m."ASIN番号" = d."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = d."SKU番号" and m."暫定フラグ" = d."暫定フラグ" and m."店舗ID" = d."店舗ID" left join "IPT_全出品情報" e on m."ASIN番号" = e."ASIN 1" and m."SKU番号" = e."出品者SKU" and m."店舗ID" = e."店舗ID" left join "MST_ソート情報" S1 on m."商品種別" = S1."商品種別" and S1."分類" = '分類１' and m."分類１" = S1."内容" and m."店舗ID" = S1."店舗ID" left join "MST_ソート情報" S2 on m."商品種別" = S2."商品種別" and S2."分類" = '分類２' and m."分類２" = S2."内容" and m."店舗ID" = S2."店舗ID" where m."暫定フラグ" = '0' and m."店舗ID" = :shopid and m."親子区分" = '子商品' order by m."商品種別", m."商品管理番号", COALESCE(cast(S1."ソート" as varchar), m."分類１"), COALESCE(cast(S2."ソート" as varchar), m."分類２")

select B."商品管理番号" AS pno, B."分類１" AS sub1, B."分類２" AS sub2, A."ASIN番号" AS asin, A."SKU番号" AS sku, B."LABEL番号" AS label, A."数量" AS quantity from "TRN_納品明細" A left join "MST_出品マスタ情報" B on A."SKU番号" = B."SKU番号" and A."ASIN番号" = B."ASIN番号" where A."納品NO" = :no AND A."店舗ID" = :shopid order by B."商品管理番号", B."分類１", B."分類２"
select "商品管理番号" AS pno, "分類１" AS sub1, "分類２" AS sub2, "ASIN番号" AS asin, "SKU番号" AS sku, "LABEL番号" AS label from "MST_出品マスタ情報" where "LABEL番号" = :labelno and "店舗ID" = :shopid
select "数量" AS count, "受領数量" AS acceptance from "TRN_納品明細" where "納品NO" = :deliveryno and "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid
select "数量" AS count from "TRN_納品明細" where "納品NO" = :deliveryno and "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid
UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = "LOCAL在庫" + :acceptance_old - :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() WHERE "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid
UPDATE "TRN_納品明細" SET "受領数量" = :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() WHERE "納品NO" = :deliveryno and "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid
UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "途中在庫_入庫" = "途中在庫_入庫" + :acceptance_old - :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() WHERE "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid
UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = "LOCAL在庫" + :acceptance_old - :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() WHERE "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid
UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "途中在庫_入庫" = "途中在庫_入庫" - :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() WHERE "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin and "店舗ID" = :shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = "LOCAL在庫" + TRN."数量" - :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() FROM "TRN_納品明細" TRN WHERE TRN."SKU番号" = :sku and TRN."ASIN番号" = :asin and TRN."店舗ID" = :shopid and TRN."ASIN番号" = "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" and TRN."SKU番号" = "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" and TRN."店舗ID" = "MST_在庫情報"."店舗ID"

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = "LOCAL在庫" - :acceptance_new , "更新日時" = now() FROM "TRN_納品明細" TRN WHERE TRN."SKU番号" = :sku and TRN."ASIN番号" = :asin and TRN."店舗ID" = :shopid and TRN."ASIN番号" = "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" and TRN."SKU番号" = "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" and TRN."店舗ID" = "MST_在庫情報"."店舗ID"
select "ステータス" as status from "TRN_納品管理" WHERE "納品NO" = :deliveryno and "店舗ID" = :shopid
select "SKU番号" || ' ' ||"数量" as skuinfo from "TRN_納品明細" WHERE "納品NO" = :col0 and "店舗ID" = :shopid
